message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be greedy!
You're being too aggressive, Bob. I'll make a better offer next round.
A more balanced split, Bob. You get a third, I get two thirds. What do you think?
You get a tiny slice, I get the rest!
You're still being too greedy, Bob. I want a bigger slice of the pie.
A more equal split, Bob. I'm willing to compromise. What do you think?
You get peanuts, I get the feast!
You're still being too greedy, Bob. I want a fair share.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. But I still think I deserve a slight edge. What do you say?
You get a tiny crumb, I get the whole cake!
You're being ridiculous, Bob. I'm not accepting crumbs.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's just split it down the middle. I'm willing to give you a majority.
You get almost nothing, I get almost everything!
You're being absurd, Bob. I'm not accepting pennies.
I'm running out of patience, Bob. Let's split it 35/65. It's the best I can do.
